         .header-1 {
   position: relative;
   background-color: rgba(1, 92, 162, 0.72);
 }
 .header-1 .navbar-header {
   padding-left: 15px;
 }
 @media screen and (min-width: 767px) {
   .header-1 .main-menu-wrap {
     position: absolute;
     z-index: 1000;
     width: 100%;
   }
 }
 .header-1 .main-menu-wrap.menu-collapsed {
   position: static;
 }
 @media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
   .header-1 .navbar-header {
     background-color: rgba(1, 92, 162, 0.72);
   }
   .header-1 .logo-wrapper {
     text-align: center;
   }
 }
 .header-1 .usual-menu .navbar-collapse {
   background-color: rgba(1, 92, 162, 0.72);
 }
 .header-1 .nivo-caption {
   font-family: inherit;
   padding: 10px 10px !important;
   opacity: 0.8 !important;
   -moz-opacity: 0.8 !important;
   filter: alpha(opacity=80) !important;
   overflow-y: auto !important;
   width: auto;
   left: auto;
   right: 0;
 }
 .header-1 .theme-default .nivo-caption a {
   border-bottom: none;
 }
 .header-1 .nivo-caption h2 {
   margin: 0;
   padding-bottom: 0;
 }
 .header-1 .brand.logo-size-small img {
   max-height: 75px;
 }
 .header-1 .brand.logo-size-normal img {
   max-height: 125px;
 }
 @media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
   .header-1 .navbar-nav {
     float: right;
     margin: 0;
   }
 }
 @media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
   .header-1 {
     /*.main-menu-wrap {
       position: static;
     } */
   }
   .header-1 .nivo-caption {
     position: relative;
     z-index: 8;
   }
   .header-1 .theme-default .nivoSlider {
     background: #fff;
   }
   .header-1 .fz-big .slide-title {
     font-size: 2em;
   }
   .header-1 .fz-big .slide-text {
     font-size: 1.4em;
   }
   .header-1 .fz-small .slide-title {
     font-size: 1.4em;
   }
   .header-1 .fz-small .slide-text {
     font-size: 0.9em;
   }

        <div class="slider-area fz-normal">
         <div id="wrapper">
          <div class="slider-wrapper theme-default">
           <div class="nivoSlider" id="header-slider">
            <a>
             <img alt="Relax. We are here to help." src="https://c12961419.preview.getnetset.com/wp-content/uploads/584-12043-18137-600.jpg" title="#htmlcaptionheaderim1"/>
            </a>
            <a>
             <img alt="Worry-free tax &amp; accounting services." src="https://c12961419.preview.getnetset.com/wp-content/uploads/15013-3392-9822-600.jpg" title="#htmlcaptionheaderim2"/>
            </a>

        <!-- #slider-area -->
        <script type="text/javascript">
         (function($, window, document) {
             $(function() {
                 // The DOM is ready!
                 $(window).load(function() {
                     $('#header-slider').nivoSlider({
                         effect: 'fade', // Specify sets like: 'fold,fade,sliceDown' or random
                         pauseTime: 7000, // How long each slide will show
                                                                 controlNav: false,
                         pauseOnHover: false,                         randomStart: false
                     });
                 });
             });
         }(window.jQuery, window, document));
        </script>

         <article class="post-3 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-3">
          <div class="entry-content">
           <section class="content-25 text-block padding-top-1 padding-bottom-1 margin-top-0 margin-bottom-0 talign-left" id="block_3-0">
            <style type="text/css">
             #block_3-0.text-block {
   background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
   background-image: none;
   background-size: cover;
   background-position: center center;
   color: #333333;
 }
 #block_3-0.text-block h3 {
   color: #333333;
   text-align: left;
 }
 #block_3-0.text-block p {
   color: #333333;
 }
 #block_3-0 .over-alpha {
   background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
 }
 #block_3-0 .over-alpha + .container,
 #block_3-0 .over-alpha + .container-fluid {
   position: relative;
   z-index: 120;
 }
 #block_3-0.text-inside {
   padding: 0 15px;
 }
 #block_3-0 .container-fluid {
   z-index: 101;
   position: relative;
 }
 /*# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json,%7B%22version%22%3A3%2C%22sources%22%3A%5B%22style.less%22%5D%2C%22names%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22mappings%22%3A%22AACE%2CCADD%2CSACE%3BEAEC%2CkCAAA%3BEACA%2CsBAAA%3BEACA%3BEACA%2CkCAAA%3BEACA%2CcAAA%3B%3BAAGF%2CCAVD%2CSAUE%2CWAAY%3BEACX%2CcAAA%3BEACA%2CgBAAA%3B%3BAAGF%2CCAfD%2CSAeE%2CWAAY%3BEACX%2CcAAA%3B%3BAAhBJ%2CCAAC%2CSAmBC%3BEACE%2CkCAAA%3B%3BAApBJ%2CCAAC%2CSAuBC%2CYAAc%3BAAvBhB%2CCAAC%2CSAwBC%2CYAAc%3BEACZ%3BEACA%3B%3BAAGF%2CCA7BD%2CSA6BE%3BEACC%2CeAAA%3B%3BAA9BJ%2CCAAC%2CSAiCC%3BEACE%3BEACA%22%7D */
            </style>
            <div class="over-alpha">
            </div>
            <div class="container-fluid">
             <div class="row animatedParent animateOnce delay-250" data-appear-top-offset="-200" data-sequence="">
              <h3 class="col-sm-12 animated fadeIn" data-id="1">
               Welcome
              </h3>
              <div class="clearfix">
              </div>
              <div class="col-md-12 text-inside animated fadeIn" data-id="2">
               <p>
                <strong>
                 Thank you for visiting our website.
                </strong>
               </p>
               <p>
                Sayler’s Accounting &amp; Tax Specialist, Inc is a full-service accounting firm serving clients in all 50 states dedicated to providing our clients with professional, personalized services and guidance in a wide range of financial and business needs.
               </p>
               <p>
                On this website, you will find information about Sayler’s Accounting &amp; Tax Specialist, Inc, including our list of services. We have also provided you with online resources to assist in the tax process and financial decision-making. These tools include downloadable tax forms and publications, financial calculators, news and links to other useful sites. Whether you are an individual or business in or around Adrian, Sayler’s Accounting &amp; Tax Specialist, Inc has years of valuable experience assisting professionals with their accounting needs.
               </p>
               <p>
                Please, feel free to browse our website to see the services we offer as well as the many helpful resources we provide. When you are ready to learn more about what we can do for you, we encourage you to
                <a href="/contact">
                 contact us
                </a>
                .
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </section>

   visibility: hidden;

   top: -7px;
   left: -7px;
   padding: 7px;

   -moz-transition: -moz-transform 0.2s, opacity 0.2s;

   transition: transform 0.2s, opacity 0.2s;
   transform: scale(0.8);

   box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.75);

   background: #ffffff;
   color: #ffffff;
 }

   -moz-transform: scale(1);
   -ms-transform: scale(1);
   transform: scale(1);

   box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #ffffff;

   left: -2px;
   padding: 2px;
   z-index: -1;
   background: #ffffff;
   -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.2s, opacity 0.3s;
   -moz-transition: -moz-transform 0.2s, opacity 0.3s;
   transition: transform 0.2s, opacity 0.3s;
 }

   background-color: #ffffff;
 }

   color: #f7f2de;
 }

   color: #ffffff;
 }

   -webkit-transform: scale(1.3);
   -moz-transform: scale(1.3);
   -ms-transform: scale(1.3);
   transform: scale(1.3);
   opacity: 0;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-3b.hi-icon {
   color: #f7f2de;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-3b.hi-icon:hover {
   color: #ffffff;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-3b.hi-icon:after {
   -webkit-transform: scale(1.3);
   -moz-transform: scale(1.3);
   -ms-transform: scale(1.3);
   transform: scale(1.3);
   opacity: 0;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-3b.hi-icon:hover:after {
   -webkit-transform: scale(1);
   -moz-transform: scale(1);
   -ms-transform: scale(1);
   transform: scale(1);
   opacity: 1;
 }
 #block_3-3 {
   /* Effect 4b */
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-4.hi-icon {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #ffffff;
   color: #f7f2de;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-4a.hi-icon {
   -webkit-transition: box-shadow 0.2s;
   -moz-transition: box-shadow 0.2s;
   transition: box-shadow 0.2s;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-4 .hi-icon:after {
   top: -4px;
   left: -4px;
   padding: 0;
   z-index: 10;
   border: 4px dashed #ffffff;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-4.hi-icon:hover {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);
   color: #ffffff;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-4b.hi-icon:hover {
   -webkit-transition: box-shadow 0.2s;
   -moz-transition: box-shadow 0.2s;
   transition: box-shadow 0.2s;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-4b.hi-icon:hover:after {
   top: -4px;
   left: -4px;
   border: 4px dashed #ffffff;
   -webkit-animation: spinAround 9s linear infinite;
   -moz-animation: spinAround 9s linear infinite;
   animation: spinAround 9s linear infinite;
 }
 @-webkit-keyframes spinAround {
   from {
     -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
   }
   to {
     -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg);
   }
 }
 @-moz-keyframes spinAround {
   from {
     -moz-transform: rotate(0deg);
   }
   to {
     -moz-transform: rotate(360deg);
   }
 }
 @keyframes spinAround {
   from {
     transform: rotate(0deg);
   }
   to {
     transform: rotate(360deg);
   }
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-5.hi-icon {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #ffffff;
   overflow: hidden;
   -webkit-transition: background 0.3s, color 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;
   -moz-transition: background 0.3s, color 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;
   transition: background 0.3s, color 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;
   color: #f7f2de;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-5.hi-icon:after {
   display: none;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-5.hi-icon:hover {
   background: #ffffff;
   color: #ffffff;
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 8px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-5a.hi-icon:hover:before {
   -webkit-animation: toRightFromLeft 0.3s forwards;
   -moz-animation: toRightFromLeft 0.3s forwards;
   animation: toRightFromLeft 0.3s forwards;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-5b.hi-icon:hover:before {
   -webkit-animation: toLeftFromRight 0.3s forwards;
   -moz-animation: toLeftFromRight 0.3s forwards;
   animation: toLeftFromRight 0.3s forwards;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-5c.hi-icon:hover:before {
   -webkit-animation: toTopFromBottom 0.3s forwards;
   -moz-animation: toTopFromBottom 0.3s forwards;
   animation: toTopFromBottom 0.3s forwards;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-5d.hi-icon:hover:before {
   -webkit-animation: toBottomFromTop 0.3s forwards;
   -moz-animation: toBottomFromTop 0.3s forwards;
   animation: toBottomFromTop 0.3s forwards;
 }
 @-webkit-keyframes toRightFromLeft {
   49% {
     -webkit-transform: translate(100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     -webkit-transform: translate(-100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 @-moz-keyframes toRightFromLeft {
   49% {
     -moz-transform: translate(100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     -moz-transform: translate(-100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 @keyframes toRightFromLeft {
   49% {
     transform: translate(100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     transform: translate(-100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 @-webkit-keyframes toLeftFromRight {
   49% {
     -webkit-transform: translate(-100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     -webkit-transform: translate(100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 @-moz-keyframes toLeftFromRight {
   49% {
     -moz-transform: translate(-100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     -moz-transform: translate(100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 @keyframes toLeftFromRight {
   49% {
     transform: translate(-100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     transform: translate(100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 @-webkit-keyframes toTopFromBottom {
   49% {
     -webkit-transform: translateY(-100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     -webkit-transform: translateY(100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }

   49% {
     -moz-transform: translateY(-100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     -moz-transform: translateY(100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 @keyframes toTopFromBottom {
   49% {
     transform: translateY(-100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     transform: translateY(100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 @-webkit-keyframes toBottomFromTop {
   49% {
     -webkit-transform: translateY(100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     -webkit-transform: translateY(-100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }

   49% {
     -moz-transform: translateY(100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     -moz-transform: translateY(-100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }

   49% {
     transform: translateY(100%);
   }
   50% {
     opacity: 0;
     transform: translateY(-100%);
   }
   51% {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-6.hi-icon {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #ffffff;
   -webkit-transition: background 0.2s, color 0.2s;
   -moz-transition: background 0.2s, color 0.2s;
   transition: background 0.2s, color 0.2s;
   color: #f7f2de;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-6.hi-icon:hover {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #ffffff;
   background: #ffffff;
   color: #ffffff;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-6.hi-icon:hover:before {
   -webkit-animation: spinAround 2s linear infinite;
   -moz-animation: spinAround 2s linear infinite;
   animation: spinAround 2s linear infinite;
 }
 #block_3-3 {
   /* Effect 7a */
   /* Effect 7b */
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-7.hi-icon {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #ffffff;
   -webkit-transition: background 0.2s, color 0.2s;
   -moz-transition: background 0.2s, color 0.2s;
   transition: background 0.2s, color 0.2s;
   color: #f7f2de;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-7.hi-icon:hover {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #ffffff;
   color: #ffffff;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-7.hi-icon:after {
   top: -8px;
   left: -8px;
   padding: 8px;
   z-index: -1;
   opacity: 0;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-7a.hi-icon:after {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 #ffffff;
   -webkit-transition: opacity 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
   -moz-transition: opacity 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
   transition: opacity 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-7a.hi-icon:hover:after {
   opacity: 1;
   box-shadow: 3px 3px 0 #ffffff;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-7a.hi-icon:before {
   -webkit-transform: scale(0.8);
   -moz-transform: scale(0.8);
   -ms-transform: scale(0.8);
   transform: scale(0.8);
   opacity: 0.7;
   -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.2s, opacity 0.2s;
   -moz-transition: -moz-transform 0.2s, opacity 0.2s;
   transition: transform 0.2s, opacity 0.2s;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-7a.hi-icon:hover:before {
   -webkit-transform: scale(1);
   -moz-transform: scale(1);
   -ms-transform: scale(1);
   transform: scale(1);
   opacity: 1;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-7b.hi-icon:after {
   box-shadow: 3px 3px #ffffff;
   -webkit-transform: rotate(-90deg);
   -moz-transform: rotate(-90deg);
   -ms-transform: rotate(-90deg);
   transform: rotate(-90deg);
   -webkit-transition: opacity 0.2s, -webkit-transform 0.2s;
   -moz-transition: opacity 0.2s, -moz-transform 0.2s;
   transition: opacity 0.2s, transform 0.2s;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-7b.hi-icon:hover:after {
   box-shadow: 3px 3px #ffffff;
   opacity: 1;
   -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
   -moz-transform: rotate(0deg);
   -ms-transform: rotate(0deg);
   transform: rotate(0deg);
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-7b.hi-icon:before {
   -webkit-transform: scale(0.8);
   -moz-transform: scale(0.8);
   -ms-transform: scale(0.8);
   transform: scale(0.8);
   opacity: 0.7;
   -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.2s, opacity 0.2s;
   -moz-transition: -moz-transform 0.2s, opacity 0.2s;
   transition: transform 0.2s, opacity 0.2s;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-7b.hi-icon:hover:before {
   -webkit-transform: scale(1);
   -moz-transform: scale(1);
   -ms-transform: scale(1);
   transform: scale(1);
   opacity: 1;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-8.hi-icon {
   background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
   -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform ease-out 0.1s, background 0.2s;
   -moz-transition: -moz-transform ease-out 0.1s, background 0.2s;
   transition: transform ease-out 0.1s, background 0.2s;
   color: #f7f2de;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-8.hi-icon:after {
   top: 0;
   left: 0;
   padding: 0;
   z-index: -1;
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
   opacity: 0;
   -webkit-transform: scale(0.9);
   -moz-transform: scale(0.9);
   -ms-transform: scale(0.9);
   transform: scale(0.9);
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-8.hi-icon:hover {
   background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
   -webkit-transform: scale(0.93);
   -moz-transform: scale(0.93);
   -ms-transform: scale(0.93);
   transform: scale(0.93);
   color: #ffffff;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-8.hi-icon:hover:after {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
   -webkit-animation: sonarEffect 1.3s ease-out 75ms;
   -moz-animation: sonarEffect 1.3s ease-out 75ms;
   animation: sonarEffect 1.3s ease-out 75ms;
 }
 @-webkit-keyframes sonarEffect {
   0% {
     opacity: 0.3;
   }
   40% {
     opacity: 0.5;
     box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), 0 0 10px 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3), 0 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
   }
   100% {
     box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), 0 0 10px 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3), 0 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
     -webkit-transform: scale(1.5);
     opacity: 0;
   }
 }
 @-moz-keyframes sonarEffect {
   0% {
     opacity: 0.3;
   }
   40% {
     opacity: 0.5;
     box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), 0 0 10px 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3), 0 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
   }
   100% {
     box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), 0 0 10px 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3), 0 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
     -moz-transform: scale(1.5);
     opacity: 0;
   }
 }
 @keyframes sonarEffect {
   0% {
     opacity: 0.3;
   }
   40% {
     opacity: 0.5;
     box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), 0 0 10px 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3), 0 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
   }
   100% {
     box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), 0 0 10px 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3), 0 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
     transform: scale(1.5);
     opacity: 0;
   }
 }

   /* Effect 9a */
   /* Effect 9b */
 }

   -webkit-transition: box-shadow 0.2s;
   -moz-transition: box-shadow 0.2s;
   transition: box-shadow 0.2s;
   color: #f7f2de;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-9.hi-icon:after {
   top: 0;
   left: 0;
   padding: 0;
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px #ffffff;
   -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.2s, opacity 0.2s;
   -moz-transition: -moz-transform 0.2s, opacity 0.2s;
   transition: transform 0.2s, opacity 0.2s;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-9a.hi-icon:hover:after {
   -webkit-transform: scale(0.85);
   -moz-transform: scale(0.85);
   -ms-transform: scale(0.85);
   transform: scale(0.85);
   opacity: 0.5;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-9a.hi-icon:hover {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 10px #ffffff;
   color: #ffffff;
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-9b.hi-icon:hover:after {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px #ffffff;
   -webkit-transform: scale(0.85);
   -moz-transform: scale(0.85);
   -ms-transform: scale(0.85);
   transform: scale(0.85);
 }
 #block_3-3 .hi-icon-effect-9b.hi-icon:hover {
   box-shadow: 0 0 0 10px #ffffff;
   color: #ffffff;
 }

             </style>

           <section class="office-map padding-top-0 padding-bottom-0 margin-top-0 margin-bottom-0" id="block_3-4">
            <style type="text/css">
             #block_3-4 .map-marker {
   color: rgba(1, 92, 162, 0.8100000000000001);
 }
 #block_3-4 .btn-primary {
   margin-top: 10px;
   background-color: rgba(1, 92, 162, 0.8100000000000001);
   border-color: rgba(1, 121, 213, 0.8100000000000001);
 }
 #block_3-4 .btn-primary:hover {
   background-color: rgba(0, 34, 61, 0.8100000000000001);
   border-color: rgba(1, 63, 111, 0.8100000000000001);
 }
 #block_3-4 .map-wrapper {
   height: 400px;
   width: 100%;
   overflow: hidden;
 }
 #block_3-4 .map {
   height: 400px;
 }
 #block_3-4 .map.parallax {
   height: 600px;
 }
 #block_3-4 .map-wrapper img {
   max-width: none;
 }
 #block_3-4 .map.parallax .gm-style > div:first-child {
   margin-top: -100px;
 }
 /*# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json,%7B%22version%22%3A3%2C%22sources%22%3A%5B%22style.less%22%5D%2C%22names%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22mappings%22%3A%22AAAA%2CCAAC%2CSACC%3BEACE%2C2CAAA%3B%3BAAFJ%2CCAAC%2CSAKC%3BEACE%3BEACA%2CsDAAA%3BEACA%2CmDAAA%3B%3BAARJ%2CCAAC%2CSAWC%2CaAAY%3BEACV%2CqDAAA%3BEACA%2CkDAAA%3B%3BAAbJ%2CCAAC%2CSAgBC%3BEACE%3BEACA%3BEACA%3B%3BAAnBJ%2CCAAC%2CSAsBC%3BEACE%3B%3BAAvBJ%2CCAAC%2CSA0BC%2CKAAI%3BEACF%3B%3BAA3BJ%2CCAAC%2CSA8BC%2CaAAa%3BEACX%3B%3BAA%5C%2FBJ%2CCAAC%2CSAkCC%2CKAAI%2CSAAU%2CUAAY%2CMAAG%3BEAC3B%22%7D */
            </style>
            <div class="map-wrapper">
             <div class="map" id="map_block_3-4">
             </div>
            </div>
           </section>
           <script>
            (function ($, window, document) {
             //var map_5b58f26d059de;
 
             function initialize() {
                 var locations = [['<div><h4>Sayler\'s Accounting & Tax Specialist, Inc</h4><p>2396 East US Highway 223 Adrian, MI 49221</p><p><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/Saylers-Accounting-Tax-Specialist-Inc-1296715837057231/ \" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><img class=\"alignnone wp-image-167\" src=\"https://c12961419.preview.getnetset.com/files/Facebook.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"142\" height=\"27\" /></a><br />Telephone: (517) 263-0204<br />Fax: (517) 265-6850<br />Email: <a href=\"&#x6d;&#x61;&#x69;&#108;&#116;o:s&#x61;&#x79;&#x6c;&#x65;&#114;sin&#x63;&#x40;&#x68;&#x6f;&#116;mai&#x6c;&#x2e;&#x63;&#x6f;&#109;\">&#x73;&#x61;yl&#x65;&#x72;&#115;in&#x63;&#x40;ho&#x74;&#x6d;&#97;il&#x2e;&#x63;om</a></p></div><p class="text-right"><a class="btn btn-primary btn-xs" href="http://maps.google.com/maps?saddr=&daddr=2396+East+US+Highway+223+Adrian%2C+MI+49221" target="_blank">Get directions</a></p>', 41.8752913,-84.015488,'0'],];
 
                 var mapConf = {
                     mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.ROADMAP,
                     disableDefaultUI: true,
                     scrollwheel: false,
                     zoomControl: true,
                     scaleControl: true,
                     panControl: true,
                     zoomControlOptions: {
                         position: google.maps.ControlPosition.RIGHT_CENTER
                     }
                 };
 
                 var map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map_block_3-4'), mapConf );
 
                 if(locations.length == 1) {
                     map.setCenter(new google.maps.LatLng(locations[0][1], locations[0][2]));
                     map.setZoom(15);
                 }
 
                 var styles = [];
 
                 styles['default'] = [];
                 styles['shades-of-grey'] = [{
                     "featureType": "all",
                     "elementType": "labels.text.fill",
                     "stylers": [{"saturation": 36}, {"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 40}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "all",
                     "elementType": "labels.text.stroke",
                     "stylers": [{"visibility": "on"}, {"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 16}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "all",
                     "elementType": "labels.icon",
                     "stylers": [{"visibility": "off"}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "administrative",
                     "elementType": "geometry.fill",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 20}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "administrative",
                     "elementType": "geometry.stroke",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 17}, {"weight": 1.2}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "landscape",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 20}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "poi",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 21}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road.highway",
                     "elementType": "geometry.fill",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 17}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road.highway",
                     "elementType": "geometry.stroke",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 29}, {"weight": 0.2}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road.arterial",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 18}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road.local",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 16}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "transit",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 19}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "water",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#000000"}, {"lightness": 17}]
                 }];
                 styles['subtle-grayscale'] = [{
                     "featureType": "landscape",
                     "stylers": [{"saturation": -100}, {"lightness": 65}, {"visibility": "on"}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "poi",
                     "stylers": [{"saturation": -100}, {"lightness": 51}, {"visibility": "simplified"}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road.highway",
                     "stylers": [{"saturation": -100}, {"visibility": "simplified"}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road.arterial",
                     "stylers": [{"saturation": -100}, {"lightness": 30}, {"visibility": "on"}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road.local",
                     "stylers": [{"saturation": -100}, {"lightness": 40}, {"visibility": "on"}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "transit",
                     "stylers": [{"saturation": -100}, {"visibility": "simplified"}]

                     "featureType": "administrative.province",
                     "stylers": [{"visibility": "off"}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "water",

                 }, {
                     "featureType": "water",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"hue": "#ffff00"}, {"lightness": -25}, {"saturation": -97}]
                 }];
                 styles['mapbox'] = [{
                     "featureType": "water",
                     "stylers": [{"saturation": 43}, {"lightness": -11}, {"hue": "#0088ff"}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road",
                     "elementType": "geometry.fill",
                     "stylers": [{"hue": "#ff0000"}, {"saturation": -100}, {"lightness": 99}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road",
                     "elementType": "geometry.stroke",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#808080"}, {"lightness": 54}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "landscape.man_made",
                     "elementType": "geometry.fill",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#ece2d9"}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "poi.park",
                     "elementType": "geometry.fill",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#ccdca1"}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road",
                     "elementType": "labels.text.fill",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#767676"}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road",
                     "elementType": "labels.text.stroke",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#ffffff"}]
                 }, {"featureType": "poi", "stylers": [{"visibility": "off"}]}, {
                     "featureType": "landscape.natural",
                     "elementType": "geometry.fill",
                     "stylers": [{"visibility": "on"}, {"color": "#b8cb93"}]
                 }, {"featureType": "poi.park", "stylers": [{"visibility": "on"}]}, {
                     "featureType": "poi.sports_complex",
                     "stylers": [{"visibility": "on"}]
                 }, {"featureType": "poi.medical", "stylers": [{"visibility": "on"}]}, {
                     "featureType": "poi.business",
                     "stylers": [{"visibility": "simplified"}]
                 }];
                 styles['ultra-light-with-labels'] = [{
                     "featureType": "water",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#e9e9e9"}, {"lightness": 17}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "landscape",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#f5f5f5"}, {"lightness": 20}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road.highway",
                     "elementType": "geometry.fill",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#ffffff"}, {"lightness": 17}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road.highway",
                     "elementType": "geometry.stroke",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#ffffff"}, {"lightness": 29}, {"weight": 0.2}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road.arterial",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#ffffff"}, {"lightness": 18}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "road.local",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#ffffff"}, {"lightness": 16}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "poi",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#f5f5f5"}, {"lightness": 21}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "poi.park",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#dedede"}, {"lightness": 21}]
                 }, {
                     "elementType": "labels.text.stroke",
                     "stylers": [{"visibility": "on"}, {"color": "#ffffff"}, {"lightness": 16}]
                 }, {
                     "elementType": "labels.text.fill",
                     "stylers": [{"saturation": 36}, {"color": "#333333"}, {"lightness": 40}]
                 }, {"elementType": "labels.icon", "stylers": [{"visibility": "off"}]}, {
                     "featureType": "transit",
                     "elementType": "geometry",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#f2f2f2"}, {"lightness": 19}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "administrative",
                     "elementType": "geometry.fill",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#fefefe"}, {"lightness": 20}]
                 }, {
                     "featureType": "administrative",
                     "elementType": "geometry.stroke",
                     "stylers": [{"color": "#fefefe"}, {"lightness": 17}, {"weight": 1.2}]
                 }];
 
                 map.
                 setOptions({styles: styles['ultra-light-with-labels']});
 
                 var bounds = new google.maps.LatLngBounds();
 
                 /*map.
                  setCenter(new google.maps.LatLng(
                  ((lat_max + lat_min) / 2.0),
                  ((lng_max + lng_min) / 2.0)
                  ));
 
                  if (lat_min == lat_max && lng_min == lng_max)
                  map.
                  setZoom(12);
                  else
                  map.
                  fitBounds(new google.maps.LatLngBounds(
                  //bottom left
                  new google.maps.LatLng(lat_min, lng_min),
                  //top right
                  new google.maps.LatLng(lat_max, lng_max)
                  ));*/
 
 
                 var infowindow = new google.maps.InfoWindow;
 
                 var marker, i, marker_0;
 
 
                 for (i = 0; i < locations.length; i++) {
                     marker = new MarkerWithLabel({
                         position: new google.maps.LatLng(locations[i][1], locations[i][2]),
                         draggable: false,
                         map: map,
 
                         icon: ' ',
                         labelContent: '<i class="fa fa-compass fa-4x"></i>',
                         labelAnchor: new google.maps.Point(13, 45),
                         labelClass: "map-marker" // the CSS class for the label
                     });
 
                     marker.setMap(map);
                     if (i == 0)
                         marker_0 = marker;
 
                     google.maps.event.addListener(marker, 'click', (function (marker, i) {
                         return function () {
 
                             infowindow.setContent(locations[i][0]);
                             infowindow.open(map, marker);
                         }
                     })(marker, i));
 
                     bounds.extend(new google.maps.LatLng(locations[i][1], locations[i][2]));
                 }
 
 
                 if(locations.length > 1) {
                     map.fitBounds(bounds);
                 }
 
                                 jQuery(window).ready(function () {
                     function showinfo() {
                         infowindow.setContent(locations[0][0]);
                         infowindow.open(map, marker_0);
                     }
 
                     setTimeout(showinfo, 1000);
                 })
                             }
 
 
             google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize);
 
             /*$(function () {
                 // The DOM is ready!
                 function parallax_maps() {
                     $('.map-wrapper').each(function () {
                         var _this = this;
                         var w_height = $(window).height();
                         var s_top = $(window).scrollTop();
                         var mapblock = $(this).find('.map .gm-style div').first();
                         var mtop = $(_this).offset().top;
                         //console.log('@@@test: ', s_top, mtop, w_height, mtop-w_height);
                         if (s_top >= mtop - w_height + 250 && s_top <= mtop + 400) {
                             var shift = ( -100 + (s_top - mtop + w_height - 400) * 0.1);
                             if (shift > 0) shift = 0;
                             mapblock.css({'margin-top': shift + 'px'});
                             //console.log('@@@shift: ', Math.ceil((s_top - mtop + w_height - 400 )*1.1)+'px');
                         }
                     });
                 }
 
 
                 $(window).on('load', parallax_maps);
                 $(window).on('scroll', parallax_maps);
 
             });*/
         }(window.jQuery, window, document));
           </script>
           <section class="content-11 cta-block" id="block_3-5">
            <div class="container-fluid padding-top-1 padding-bottom-1 margin-top-0 margin-bottom-0">
             <style type="text/css">
              #block_3-5 .container,

   background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
   background-image: url("http://preview.getnetset.com/wp-content/uploads/30915-3410-66667-350.jpg");
   background-size: cover;
   color: #ffffff;
   position: relative;
   z-index: 101;
 }

   text-align: center;
 }

   text-align: center;
 }

   color: #ffffff;
 }

   color: #7f7f7f;
   opacity: 1;
 }

   color: #ffffff;
 }

   color: #ffffff;
 }

   color: #ffffff;
 }

   text-align: ;
 }

   background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.93);
   border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.93);

   border-color: rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.93);

   background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
 }

   }

     text-align: center;
   }
 }
